definition: angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Why? Because it has angular momentum.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼，因爲有了一個角動量。

sentences.english: During the past four lectures, we have dealt with angular momentum, torques and rolling objects and rotations.
sentences.chinese: 前四講中，我們討論過角動量，力矩滾動物體及旋轉。

sentences.english: Angular momentum is pointing straight at me, away from you.
sentences.chinese: 角動量直接指向我，遠離你們的方向。

sentences.english: Angular momentum is now in this direction.
sentences.chinese: 角動量現在是在這個方向。

sentences.english: I am the spin angular momentum.
What will the angular momentum vector do?
sentences.chinese: 角動量的矢量會怎樣呢？

sentences.english: Moreover, additional angular momenta are added to the off-axis propagating solitons.
sentences.chinese: 此外，軸外傳輸的孤子會獲得附加的角動量。

sentences.english: Here is an example of the usefulness of the concepts of angular impulse and angular momentum.
sentences.chinese: 這有一個例子，可以說明角衝量和角動量概念的用途。

sentences.english: Angular momentum is in this direction.
It describes the angular momentum of the electron.
sentences.chinese: 它描述的是，電子的叫角動量。

sentences.english: Laguerre Gaussian(LG) mode carries a well defined orbit angular momentum.
sentences.chinese: 模是光子的軌道角動量的本徵態。

sentences.english: Any rotating body has an angular momentum about its center of mass.
sentences.chinese: 任何旋轉的物體在其質心附近都有一個角動量。

sentences.english: What will the spin angular momentum do?
sentences.chinese: 旋轉的角動量會怎樣呢？

sentences.english: The spin is an intrinsic angular momentum associated with microscopic particles.
sentences.chinese: 自旋是指微觀粒子有一定角動量的運動。

sentences.english: We can actually think about why that is, and the reason is that l is angular momentum.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以這樣想，因爲，l是角動量。

sentences.english: The electronic structures and the magic angular momentums in the quantum dots are analyzed with the symmetry constraints.
sentences.chinese: 用對稱性分析了量子點中幻角動量和電子結構。
